HYPERTENSION MANAGEMENT
📋
Recommendations:
• Reduce salt intake
• Exercise regularly
• Manage stress
• Monitor blood pressure
⚠
Important Notes:
• Avoid excessive salt
• Limit alcohol consumption
• Don't skip medications
🏥
Visit your doctor for blood pressure monitoring
